name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - A | Brain Teasers | 15 Questions

questions.text:
A telescope word is one that is three words in one.  If you drop the first letter of a word, you get a new word, and drop the first letter again for one more word.  For instance, a clue might read "beverage - skating _ - pen fluid."  A beverage is a drink, and subtract a letter for rink, and subtract a letter for ink.  Got it, ok!

Remember, all these words begin with the letter A!  Just give the longest word.  For instance, in the previously worked example, you would give "drink" as your answer.

In or to another country - Spacious - Street
Angle under 90 degrees - Adorable - Indian tribe
The same - Desire/want - Dwight Eisenhower nickname
To entertain - Goddess who inspires poets/musicians/artists/etc. - Employ
Type of love - Open your mouth wide - Primate
Very dry - Throw away - Ego, superego, and _
"To no _"; of no use - Popular skiing spot in Colorado, USA - To be ill
Type of scarf - one from Scotland - Type of bed
Behind a ship - Strict - Type of bird

The final two questions will have 4 definitions instead of the regular 3!  Are you ready?

To have ambition - Point on church tower - Belgian priest; Nobel Prize 1958 - Anger
